name: The Sky Climber
description: Climb, Smash, and Shatter your way to the top! The Sky Climber is a very fun and simple game where you have to reach the top by wrecking and exploding anything in your way! Warning: avoid falling to the bottom of the construction site!
minimum_requirements: Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
